title: JKPCL, RUVNL to purchase 1,000 MW power from SJVN
description: Jammu & Kashmir Power Corporation Ltd (JKPCL) and Rajasthan Urja Vidyut Nigam Limited (RUVNL) have agreed to purchase power from SJVN Ltd. JKPCL will buy 600 MW and RUVNL will buy 500 MW of power from SJVN. The power will be purchased at a tariff of Rs 2.57/kWh. Additionally, SJVN will offer power to beneficiaries in the northern region from a 1,000 MW solar PV station.
